statement.p: In 42.86 of the last 35 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{35}}={0.4286}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{35}. \displaystyle{P}={0.4286}\cdot{35}={15.001}. We round that as requested to 15 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
